n,s=map(int,input().split())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
a.sort()
if sum(a[:-1])<=s:
    print('YES')
else:
    print('NO')

n, v = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

print('YES' if sum(a) - max(a) <= v else 'NO')

n, s = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.remove(max(a))
ans = sum(a) > s
print("NO" if ans else "YES")

n,s = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
l = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
l.sort()
if sum(l[:-1]) <= s:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

from sys import stdin

n, s = list(map(int, stdin.readline().split()))
arr = list(map(int, stdin.readline().split()))
if(sum(arr) - max(arr) > s):
    print("NO")
else:
    print("YES")

n, s = map(int, input().split())
a = sorted(map(int, input().split()))
print("NO" if sum(a[:n - 1]) > s else "YES")

n,s=map(int,input().split())
alist=[int(x) for x in input().split()]

alist.sort()

if sum(alist[:(n-1)])<=s:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

arr.sort()

#print(n, s, arr)

#print(sum(arr[:-1]))

if sum(arr[:-1]) <= s:

n, s = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = [i for i in map(int, input().split())]

r = ["NO", "YES"]
z = sum(a) - max(a) <= s
#print(max(a))
print(r[z])

n,s = list(map(int,input().split()))
a = list(map(int,input().split()))
s_a=sorted(a)
t=0
for i in range(n-1):
	t+=s_a[i]
print('YES' if t<=s else 'NO')

n, s = list(map(int, input().split()))
krush = list(map(int, input().split()))
chasha = 0
res = 'YES'
krush.sort()
friend = 0
while res == 'YES' and friend < len(krush)-1:
    chasha += krush[friend]
    if chasha > s:
        res = 'NO'
    friend += 1
print(res)

n, s = map(int, input().split())
t = list(map(int, input().split()))
t = sorted(t)
if sum(t[:n - 1]) <= s:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

data = input().rstrip().split()
n = int(data[0])
s = int(data[1])

su = 0
ma = 0
data = input().rstrip().split()
for i in range(n):
    a = int(data[i])
    su += a
    if ma < a:
        ma = a

su -= ma
print('YES' if su <= s else 'NO')

n,s=map(int,input().split())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
a=sorted(a)
if sum(a[0:n-1])<=s:
    print('YES')
else:
    print('NO')

n, s = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
result = "NO"

m = max(a)
if sum(a) - m <= s:
    result = "YES"

print(result)

def readln(): return tuple(map(int, input().split()))

n, s = readln()
a = readln()
print('YES' if sum(a) - max(a) <= s else 'NO')

n, s = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = sorted(a)
if sum(a[:-1]) <= s:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")
